00013 #include "stxxl/bits/common/rand.h"
00014 #include "stxxl/bits/common/simple_vector.h"
00015 
00016 #include <memory>
00017 #include <list>

00019 
00020 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00021 
00024 
00025 enum pager_type
00026 {
00027     random,
00028     lru
00029 };
00030 
00032 template <unsigned npages_>
00033 class random_pager
00034 {
00035     random_number<random_uniform_fast> rnd;
00036 public:
00037     enum { n_pages = npages_ };
00038     random_pager() { };
00039     ~random_pager() { };
00040     int_type kick()
00041     {
00042         return rnd(npages_);
00043     }
00044     void hit(int_type ipage)
00045     {
00046         assert(ipage < int_type(npages_));
00047         assert(ipage >= 0);
00048     }
00049 };
00050 
00052 template <unsigned npages_>
00053 class lru_pager
00054 {
00055     typedef std::list<int_type> list_type;
00056 
00057     std::auto_ptr<list_type> history;
00058     simple_vector<list_type::iterator> history_entry;
00059 
00060 private:
00061     lru_pager(const lru_pager &);
00062     lru_pager & operator = (const lru_pager &);     // forbidden
00063 public:
00064     enum { n_pages = npages_ };
00065 
00066     lru_pager() : history(new list_type), history_entry(npages_)
00067     {
00068         for (unsigned_type i = 0; i < npages_; i++)
00069             history_entry[i] = history->insert(history->end(), static_cast<int_type>(i));
00070     }
00071     ~lru_pager() { }
00072     int_type kick()
00073     {
00074         return history->back();
00075     }
00076     void hit(int_type ipage)
00077     {
00078         assert(ipage < int_type(npages_));
00079         assert(ipage >= 0);
00080         history->splice(history->begin(), *history, history_entry[ipage]);
00081     }
00082     void swap(lru_pager & obj)
00083     {
00084         // workaround for buggy GCC 3.4 STL
00085         //std::swap(history,obj.history);
00086         std::auto_ptr<list_type> tmp = obj.history;
00087         obj.history = history;
00088         history = tmp;
00089         std::swap(history_entry, obj.history_entry);
00090     }
00091 };
00092 
00094 
00095 __STXXL_END_NAMESPACE
00096 
00097 namespace std
00098 {
00099     template <unsigned npages_>
00100     void swap(      stxxl::lru_pager < npages_ > & a,
00101                     stxxl::lru_pager<npages_> & b)
00102     {
00103         a.swap(b);
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 #endif
